page.shortlink: grid component client side onrowselect event
page.description: Fires when a Grid row is selected.
page.discussion: The *[js:onRowSelect]* event is triggered when a row in the Grid component is selected. *[js:onRowSelect]* is available for every type of Grid component (both editable and read only.)

argument.name: e
argument.description: An object passed to the event that contains the following properties:

property.name: rowNumber
property.description: The row number of the Grid row that fired the event. New record rows have negative row numbers.
